version_description:
• Please note: after this update, you will only be able to purchase tickets using a SwissPass login. If you do not yet have a login, you can create one now in the app.
• SBB Mobile Preview has been combined with a new system. If you have any problems with the version you can still use the main app SBB Mobile.
• This change means that connection tickets cannot be purchased in the app at the moment.
• From now on, you can use the app to buy tickets without logging in.
• Bugfix

• UX improvement
• Bugfix

• Monthly invoice: from now on, you can use the app to buy tickets on account.
• Half-Fare travelcard on the SwissPass linked with a ticket works again.
• You can now buy Saver Day Passes directly in the app.
• Bugfixes for SwissPass Login

• Monthly invoice: from now on, you can use the app to buy tickets on account.
• Half-Fare travelcard on the SwissPass linked with a ticket works again.
• You can now buy Saver Day Passes directly in the app.
• Bugfixes for SwissPass Login

With every update, we try to reduce the errors and limitations that may occur during the system change. Thank you for your feedback.
• Bugfixes for the ticket purchase
• Bugfixes for SwissPass Login
• Improvements for iPhone X incl. Face ID support
• UX improvement

With every update, we try to reduce the errors and limitations that may occur during the system change. Thank you for your feedback.
• Troubleshooting when logging into the SwissPass.
• You can now store more than two payment methods in the app.

• New routing function for transfers at Berne, Lucerne and Fribourg stations.
• Optimised information regarding changing trains, pedestrian route, etc.
• Optimised guest purchase
• Bugfixes
• You can now specify travelcard zones again and purchase extension tickets.
• You can now specify travelcard zones again and purchase extension tickets.

• Make seat and bicycle space reservations on available routes in the app itself.
• Report dirt and faults on the train or at the station directly to us via the app under «Repair & Clean».

• Make seat and bicycle space reservations on available routes in the app itself.
• Report dirt and faults on the train or at the station directly to us via the app under «Repair & Clean».
• Bugfixes

• Troubleshooting the “Share” function.
• New maps for changing trains at Geneva, Zurich and Basel stations.
• Bugfixes

• With SwissPass Mobile, you can easily display your public transport travelcard, such as a GA travelcard, Half-Fare travelcard, Track 7 or regional travelcard, in a digital format on your smartphone.
• The Travel Cockpit has been completely revamped and now provides improved journey recognition and even smarter travel tips.
• New maps for changing trains at Renens, Vevey, Montreux and Lausanne.
• New app icon
• Bugfixes

• With SwissPass Mobile, you can easily display your public transport travelcard, such as a GA travelcard, Half-Fare travelcard, Track 7 or regional travelcard, in a digital format on your smartphone.
• The Travel Cockpit has been completely revamped and now provides improved journey recognition and even smarter travel tips.
• New maps for changing trains at Renens, Vevey, Montreux and Lausanne.
• New app icon
• Bugfixes

• Bugfixes for SwissPass Mobile
• Bugfixes for Travel Cockpit

- 3D Touch - fast access to the first 4 tiles in the app
- Faster startup of the app
- Bugfixes
• Bugfixes
• Bugfixes
- Bugfixes

- EasyRide: Making travel even easier – Check in, get on board, off you go.
- New payment method Reka
- Optimisations for zone upgrades in the Z-Pass network
- You can now enter travel companions in the menu under “Travelers”
- Bugfixes

- Bugfixes.

· New menu item “My travelcards” — view and manage your travelcards on the SwissPass in the app.
· The train formation display will now inform you about the expected occupancy rate of each coach.
· EasyRide optimisations:
· New — pay with TWINT and Reka.
· Your travelcards on the SwissPass will be applied automatically.
· New — can now also be used for boat trips in the GA travelcard area of validity.
· Improvements to the timetable
· General bug fixes

· New menu item “My travelcards” — view and manage your travelcards on the SwissPass in the app.
· The train formation display will now inform you about the expected occupancy rate of each coach.
· EasyRide optimisations:
· New — pay with TWINT and Reka.
· Your travelcards on the SwissPass will be applied automatically.
· New — can now also be used for boat trips in the GA travelcard area of validity.
· Improvements to the timetable
· General bug fixes
High time for a spring clean at SBB Preview: we have tidied up the app and reorganised the menu. We hope that it will be easier for you to find your way around the app now. If not, let us know.
General bug fixes

· New: it’s now even easier to find the cheapest supersaver ticket via the price display in the timetable
· Optimised ticket purchasing
· General bug fixes
